meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #950.

div.div: missing introductions, J! round, and first 8 clues of the DJ! round.

td.p: Harriet Helfand, an attorney from Fallston, Maryland (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,801)

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):
Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: [The TH was upper case and the same size as the 20.]

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_1_1', 'clue_DJ_1_1_stuck', 'It\'s alleged that from Nov. \'65 - Feb. \'86 this couple stole $5-10 billion of their gov\'t funds')

glider or sail plane

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_1_4', 'clue_DJ_1_4_stuck', '(Alex: [sternly kidding] Harriet! I asked for 2; you gave me 3.)
(Harriet: Oh.)
(Alex: You\'re right on all three.)
[Laughter and applause]
(Alex: You\'re just trying to show off, I know. Well done.)

(2 of) Vietnam, Cambodia, & Laos

Harriet
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_1_5', 'clue_DJ_1_5_stuck', '(Kathryn: [*]? P-U-T-S-C-H.)
(Alex: You didn\'t have to spell it.)
(Kathryn: I\'m not sure how to pronounce it.)
(Alex: You pronounced it very well.)

(Beerhall) Putsch

Kathryn
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '
HarrietWhat were the Holy Roman Empire?
$5,799
DennisWhat was the rule of the Hapsbu
$5,995
KathrynWho was Charlaman
$6,000
Holy Roman Empire')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Germany\'s 3rd Reich was the Nazi regime, the 2nd was the 1871-1918 monarchy, while the 1st Reich was this')

tr.td: Germany's 3rd Reich was the Nazi regime, the 2nd was the 1871-1918 monarchy, while the 1st Reich was this
